ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 2 cups persimmon pulp, 2 cups white sugar, 3  eggs, lightly beaten, 1   +   1/4 cups buttermilk, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 79mg 26%, Sodium 452mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 96g 35%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 52g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 39mg 196%, Calcium 112mg 9%, Iron 3mg 19%, Potassium 302mg 6%
